features: TRUSTED FORMULA: We are a trusted global infant formula brand - with 10+ years of experience in infant formula category and we are at the forefront of dairy nutrition. Our mission is to nurture the lives (and tummies) of babies around the world through our nutritionally complete infant formula made with pure and natural a2 Milk.

THE a2 Milk DIFFERENCE: Our first ingredients in a2 Platinum are pure whole and nonfat a2 Milk - real milk delivering valuable dairy nutrition. The milk in a2 Platinum is from cows that naturally produce only the A2 protein and no A1.

NUTRIONALLY COMPLETE: Provides the nutritional foundation your baby needs to achieve their important first year milestones. a2 Platinum is formulated for tiny tummies and based on a unique whey and casein protein blend. Contains Vitamin E, prebiotics, DHA and choline.

EXCELLENT SAFETY RECORD: a2 Platinum has never had a recall during its history in market. With a flawless track record of zero recalls, our team is focused on delivering high-quality products. Testing is an integral part of the manufacturing process. Ingredients, packaging components, and the final product are tested at multiple stages of production.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Globally Trusted Formula We are a trusted global infant formula brand - with 10+ years of experience in the infant formula category and we are at the forefront of dairy nutrition.

a2 Platinum a2 Platinum infant formula has been trusted by millions of families around the globe. We take great pride in nourishing babies around the world and are committed to bringing you a safe and trusted formula for your little one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will keep purchasing
reviews.reviewText: I like the fact that you can pick between two different sizes. It's a health alternative to American formulas. Came well packaged. Arrived on time. Easy on my baby. Good smell. I recommend and will keep purchasing it though Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Readily accepted and easy to digest
reviews.reviewText: For our daughter we used this for the first 12 months in conjunction with breast milk. She seamlessly jumped between the two, and would very rarely spit up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for babies
reviews.reviewText: I won't advise on what to feed your baby. However, I can share that this formula is on par with leading brands in terms of ingredients and the percentage of vitamins. It has a similar smell and appearance to most major brands. When we switched our baby to this formula, she experienced no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good formula without all the fillers
reviews.reviewText: Let me start this off by saying that I have a very picky 6 month old who absolutely knows when we change anything with her formula. We've used many different types of formula including gentle, hypoallergenic, goat, etc., and nothing seemed to sit well with her until we switched to cow's milk formula with A2 proteins.Now, we have been using another brand with similar ingredients that is also A2, however, she has had some tummy troubles with it. We're about 2/3 of the way done with this can of formula and so far, it seems to work a lot better for her. I love how it's very clean and lacks all of the extras that other formulas of its nature tend to add. It does seem a little bit foamier than other formulas, but I found adding it to very warm water helps it to dissolve better and dissipates the foam quicker. I also allow it to sit a few minutes before giving it to her, which allows the foam and bubbles to settle.Most importantly, my daughter seems to like the taste or at least doesn't mind it. It didn't seem to phase her at all that we changed anything so that's definitely a plus. We may end up switching to this full time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality a2 infant formula
reviews.reviewText: Great product that I feel comfortable feeding my baby and is one that he enjoys as well. The quality of ingredients is great and this brand is one that I feel comfortable trusting. The formula can be a bit difficult to mix if the water isn't warm enough but that isn't a huge deal because the formula we've used prior had the same issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I tried this formula to supplement a breastfeeding baby. It’s an excellent choice, my 4 month old baby accepted this milk with no problem. It does have an odd taste (yes I tried it before feeding it to my baby) and leaves my baby with stinky breath. No big deal. We didn’t notice any gas or fussiness, he poop once a day or every two days as normal. My baby ended up finishing the can with no issues. Yes I do recommend this brand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn't really like it
reviews.reviewText: My daughter wasn't a fan of the taste. The can has a lip which makes getting scoops of powder level very easy. Easy to mix as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice find of A2 formula
reviews.reviewText: A2 milk is something I have found in other countries but not here. It is nice to find a formula made with a2 milk due to it being more tolerated than other milks. New Zealand products are very high quality. This won’t disappoint. It’s a good buy!
